name: Pothole Fork of Sleepy Hollow
description:
Joins Sleepy Hollow below the X section. The Pothole Fork itself is very short. It has two 15â€™ rappels that can be done with a sandtrap and meat anchor respectively. Although it is not R, it dumps you into Big Tony where you are met with an R slot section. Entering via the head of the main fork is much more interesting and the X section above the confluence with the 1st fork can be avoided by scrambling out LDC and re-entering about 300 feet down canyon.

Approach

Descent

Exit

Red tape
